snippet.title: Unforgiving Trials The Space Crusade Trailer
snippet.description:
The world is dying. Many years after the banishment of evil that plagued the land, world was hit by the waves of unbearable heat. Crops are withering, rivers and wells drying and cattle felled by waves of illness.

During his desperate work to save his family farm from the heat, young farmer named Jory was suddenly visited by mysterious stranger claiming that the land could be saved and that he is the one who can help save it.
